Description: A Fintech, Blockchain and Digital Asset focused company
Full Description: At REDline Blockchain, we firmly believe that financial autonomy and access to resources should be a fundamental  right for all individuals, regardless of their socio-economic background or geographical location. As such, we are  dedicated to utilizing state-of-the-art technology to establish a financial infrastructure that is inclusive and  equitable, with a focus on promoting economic growth and development in marginalized communities. As a platform, we operate under the ecosystem of the following product lines: REDFi (The one-stop-shop for fiat and digital asset transactions). Introducing REDFi - the fintech neo-banking platform that's here to revolutionize the way you manage your  finances! With us, you can easily handle all your traditional banking and digital assets in one convenient and secure  location. We've got you covered from start to finish - open a US custodian account, fund it, trade, and transfer your assets, all  without breaking a sweat. Plus, our platform is jam-packed with features that cater to both individuals and  businesses, making it the ultimate solution for all your financial needs. We understand that asset security is a top priority, which is why we partnered with Trust in USA, a regulated Trust  Company and Qualified Custodian, to ensure that your assets are protected like Fort Knox. Our Trust is strictly  regulated by the Financial Institutions Division of the Department of Business and Industry and the State of Nevada,  so you can trust that your assets are always in safe hands. At REDFi, we take compliance seriously. We adhere to all KYC and AML regulations to ensure that our customers'  funds are secure and protected. Our onboarding process is quick and easy, with top-notch identity verification  technology to keep your privacy and security intact. Our platform supports US-Dollar and a plethora of digital currencies, including Bitcoin, Ether, Avalanche, Cardano,  Litecoin, Solana, USDC, USDC (Avalanche), USDC (Stellar), and USDT, with more on the way, including other Fiat  currencies. We're excited to welcome customers from the United States, Panama, Guatemala, and Colombia, and we're  continuously expanding our reach to more countries. At REDFi, we're committed to delivering top-notch financial  services, with the highest level of security and protection, so you can focus on what matters most - growing your  wealth. RED Wallet (Access to all things RedLine) RED Wallet is a hybrid model built on the Polygon network, offering an intuitive and simple way to connect to  RedLine ecosystem-based applications. With its advanced security features, it provides a secure platform for  sending, receiving, and storing digital tokens and NFTs. REDNFT Marketplace. (Connecting the world to the creator economy). REDNFT is built on the Polygon decentralized network, providing creators with complete ownership of their digital  content, including videos, pictures, music, and artwork. Moreover, Redline offers creators an innovative platform  for monetizing their work using NFTs, while also enabling them to connect with their fans on a deeper level and  establishing a subscription-based content distribution model. To ensure a high level of security and compliance, Redline's hybrid model incorporates advanced security features  and onboarding through our wallet, which includes built-in KYC and AML measures. This ensures that all users are  properly verified, and transactions are secure and in compliance with regulations.  As an organization, we are committed to advancing economic freedom and inclusivity through the utilization of  technology. We employ a holistic approach, which includes expanding our user base, diversifying our assets, and  introducing innovative products and services, to achieve our overarching objective. Since our launch in 2022, we have made substantial progress in this regard and will continue to strive towards  providing superior user experiences and building a robust, long-term platform. Join us in our mission to revolutionize the way the world conducts transactions and empower the next generation  to take control of their financial futures. Together, we can create a more equitable and prosperous future for all.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Los Angeles Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Financial Services, Other, Payments, Software

Description: Inventors of NFAs (Non Fungible Ad-spaces) empowering advertising with audited analytics embedded in Blockchain
Full Description: Adguin is a groundbreaking platform that harnesses the power of Non Fungible Ad-spaces (NFAs) to transform the digital advertising landscape. It provides advertisers and publishers with a unique opportunity to convert their ads into NFAs, enabling them to showcase and monetize their content in unprecedented ways. By leveraging blockchain technology, Adguin offers a decentralized marketplace where advertisers can directly connect with publishers, facilitating transparent and efficient transactions. With Adguin, advertisers gain control over their ad placements, targeting specific audiences and optimizing their campaigns for maximum impact. Publishers, on the other hand, can generate additional revenue streams by selling ad spaces directly to advertisers. By eliminating intermediaries and integrating NFAs into the advertising ecosystem, Adguin revolutionizes the way ads are created, distributed, and monetized. It opens up new possibilities for branding partnerships, expands the reach of ads across digital and physical spaces, and ensures a more engaging and relevant user experience. Adguin is at the forefront of the NFT revolution, empowering advertisers and publishers to unlock the full potential of their advertising efforts in a decentralized and innovative manner.

Industry Groups: Advertising, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Data and Analytics, Media and Entertainment, Sales and Marketing, Science and Engineering, Software

Description: Borderless is a fully global, online marketplace for people to discover and shop from brands across the world.
Full Description: Borderless is a fully global, online marketplace for people to discover and shop from brands across the world.  Our marketplace is built to localize, simplify, and discover.   We aim to completely localize the shopping experience for international consumers.  Offering language translation, currency conversion, and global payment methods are only the start of our marketplace localization.   Borderless simplifies the international selling process for brands by handling import documentation, global taxation, and payment processing.  We make it easy for all brands to go global, especially companies with limited resources.  Our innovative software and tools allow for an effortless and affordable global selling experience.   Our marketplace serves as a bridge between brand exposure and consumer discovery.  Each week, the borderless homepage showcases exciting companies that are new to the platform, and brands that are gaining traction around the world.  For continuous engagement, our technology provides a personalized shopping experience for each user to discover the world’s products and brands they’re most interested in.    Whether it’s a boutique retailer in the United States, or a silk shop in India, Borderless provides a platform for the world to purchase with ease. Let's make global simple.

Description: AIGC Chain's solution is focusing on responsible generative AI deployment, leveraging blockchain for traceability, proof of ownership, etc.
Full Description: AIGC Chain's solution is focusing on responsible AI by establishing a traceable AI system through its unique identity authentication and authorization processes for AI models on our smart contract.  We have built over the past 2 and half years our own proprietary model of 100 billion parameters, ready to train and deploy Student Models (personalized assistants/chatbots/GPTs) at scale.  By encoding the first few fields of the AI model into a unique binary ID, the identity of the model is established. The model authorization system, where a license is generated as a unique authentication ID, ensures that the AI model can only be used with the authorization of the owner. This authorization is linked to the owner's personal crypto address and the physical machine where the model is deployed (such as a GPU) through a smart contract.  These processes ensure that the use and deployment of the AI models are transparent and traceable, promoting responsible AI development.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Miami Area, East Coast, Southern US
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Information Technology

Description: Mozverse creates Web3 platforms and tools to help businesses build and grow amazing Web3 apps, services, and experiences.
Full Description: Empowering everyone to succeed in Web3 Our values:  We believe that web3 should be fully transparent and open to everyone. Recent high-profile failures in the crypto industry have demonstrated the dangers of small, centralized groups operating in secrecy. While incumbent players with deep pockets try to replicate the walled-garden approach of web2 in web3, we believe that web3 requires a more level playing field. What we do:  We provide the tools that businesses need to deploy web3 products and services to their own target market. Who we serve:  We do not limit ourselves to a specific size of organization. Our target firms could be startups or Fortune 500 companies. What connects them is a desire to solve problems such as how to build products and engage customers in the meta-economy, or how to adapt their existing business to web3.

Description: XPDEL: The Leading Fulfillment Services Provider
Full Description: At XPDEL, we are a leading high-tech 3PL partner specializing in providing streamlined supply chain solutions for both B2B and D2C companies. Our focus is on delivering exceptional results through quick onboarding and accurate order delivery, ensuring a seamless integration process with various marketplaces and carriers. Our advanced automated fulfillment process goes beyond the conventional pick, pack, and ship model, providing customized workflows tailored to each client's specific requirements. From personalized packaging and branding experiences to innovative options like inserts, kitting, and bundling, we create memorable unboxing experiences for end customers. With our strategically located fulfillment centers, we offer nationwide coverage and efficient management of returns, ensuring comprehensive pan-US coverage.  When it comes to logistics and last-mile delivery, we set the standard for excellence. We offer flexible shipping options including same-day, next-day, and two-day delivery, ensuring that customer orders reach their destinations in the shortest possible time. Our live tracking and notifications keep customers informed at every step of the delivery process, providing a transparent and reliable experience. Our drivers are equipped with the latest technology, enabling them to handle last-minute changes with ease and ensuring a seamless first-mile to last mile delivery journey. Additionally, our dedicated 24x7 customer support team is always available to address any queries or concerns, providing exceptional service throughout.  Our inventory management solutions are designed to optimize supply chain operations. By leveraging distributed inventory management, we strategically position inventory closer to customers, reducing shipping costs and delivery times. With our robust systems, we ensure inventory accuracy and provide real-time visibility into stock levels. Our cloud-based solution allows for accurate forecasting and optimization of inventory based on demand, ensuring businesses are never out-of-stock or overstocked. With XPDEL, businesses can efficiently manage their inventory and make data-driven decisions to effectively meet customer demands.  As a high-tech 3PL provider, we harness the power of technology to drive efficiency and effectiveness. Our in-house Order Management System (OMS) seamlessly integrates with all sales channels, providing real-time updates on order status, inventory levels, exceptions, and financial data. Our Warehouse Management System (WMS) enables effective inventory management and accurate order fulfillment through various workflows such as FIFO, FEFO, LIFO, kitting, containerization, rentals, and returns. Additionally, our Transportation Management System (TMS) automates rate shopping and shipping method selection, ensuring cost-effective shipping solutions that meet customer promises.  Partner with XPDEL today and unlock the full potential of your supply chain. Our high-tech 3PL solutions, experienced team, and commitment to excellence make us the ideal growth partner for B2B and D2C companies. Experience seamless onboarding, accurate order delivery, and integrated logistics services with XPDEL.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Los Angeles Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Transportation

Description: Gopher provides Authorization as a Service to secure remote workforces.
Full Description: Gopher Security provides out-of-box zero-trust authorization services to secure your remote networks and applications. Old school firewalls are not secure anymore in the era of remote workforces. Firewalls create organizational perimeters and have to open up many "holes" for remote employees to communicate in and out. This amplifies attacking surfaces significantly. Gopher uses customizable policies and provides object level access control and point-to-point end-to-end encrypted tunnels to best secure remote devices and applications. Gopher Zero-trust Security assumes that nothing is trusted by default. Instead, all communications between devices and applications must be authorized subject to passing checks of organizational customized security policies. Gopher delivers the best cybersecurity guarantees for the remote workforces.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, Silicon Valley, West Coast
Industry Groups: Information Technology, Privacy and Security, Software

Description: StruxHub is a construction management software for field teams to coordinate materials deliveries, work permits, scheduled tasks & more.
Full Description: StruxHub was born walking jobsites. We’ve spent hundreds of hours talking with builders around the world and trying to understand their daily frictions. Each conversation seems to light a spark. Ask a new question. Focus our attention. Ultimately, these conversations are why we built StruxHub. Repeatedly, we saw that—no matter where you were in the world, how progressive the contractor, how critical the job—Projects still suffered from unplanned delivery trucks showing up and waiting for hours on the street to get on site. This daily chaos was disrupting work and was costing builders time and money. When digging into why this was happening, we found that it was simply that general contractors lacked access to the right tools. Paper forms and whiteboards simply didn’t match the speed and agility needed in orchestrating the real-time coordination needed on complex jobsites. This discovery eventually allowed us to articulate our broader mission at StruxHub; that is, to help builders build better—with greater transparency, with less waste, and with more consistent outcomes. Despite all the activity in construction tech, there is still an enormous opportunity to better serve the day-to-day operational needs of construction professionals in the field. So to all of the builders out there, we at StruxHub just wanted to let you know that we hear you. And we’re looking forward to walking your jobsite with you. Talk to you soon.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Real Estate, Software

Description: ZIG is a disruptive and revolutionary mobile media technology platform that delivers content to users in a way they’ve never seen before.
Full Description: ZIG (ZIG Media Inc.) is a mobile media technology platform. Its first product, an iOS app focused on the pop-culture space, launched on January 13, 2018. The company was founded by entrepreneurs, Joshua James, Adam Platzner and John Tornow. Founding investors include the global entertainment conglomerate Live Nation, former Vanity Fair Editor Graydon Carter, CAA founder and NBC Universal Vice Chairman Ron Meyer, legendary music producer Quincy Jones and Billionaire Investor Vivi Nevo among others.  ZIG is a disruptive and revolutionary platform that makes consuming, sharing and reacting to news easier and more efficient. Its technology automatically distills articles into pictures and videos. And then places that content into a personalized stream, where users can view content in real-time.  The consumer app product intuitively knows who you care about, serving only the content users seek. A patent pending feature within the app allows users to post physical reactions to content and then share that reaction across their existing social media footprint.  ZIG disrupts the old school publisher model, transforming how information is delivered and consumed. ZIG’s parent company, ZIG Media, is a mobile media technology company that creates products which transform and disrupt the global media landscape. ZIG enables people to consume, share, and react to content in a way that prioritizes images and video over words. It addresses both a worldwide time famine and the general need to consume information efficiently. The platform’s underlying technology makes for a personalized, easy experience that eliminates noise and focuses only on what’s important to an individual user. ZIG's products optimize content consumption while driving traffic to publishers and social media outlets.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Apps, Media and Entertainment, Mobile, Software
Founders: Adam Platzner, John Tornow, Joshua James

Description: Producer of ultra-low carbon cementitious binders that replace portland cement in conventuional concrete of all types and grades.
Full Description: Ultra High Materials is a company of chemists, physicists, materials scientists, and entrepreneurs who have created, patented, reduced to practice, and initiated commercialization of novel cementitious materials which replace 100% of portland cement in conventional cement and concrete. UHM’s new materials reduce embodied CO2 by 80% to 90%,demonstrate superior performance, are cost competitive, and may be manufactured in existing batch plants using locally available raw materials with workability identical to conventional concrete. The company has two novel formulation platforms - geopolymers and hydraulic systems - from which new materials may be derived. These new materials may be designed and customized for any given application of cement or concrete as ready-mix or precast and for use in structural, non-structural, and architectural products and projects. The company licenses it's technology globally as well as manufacturers and sells cementitious binders with commercial strategic partners.

Description: AI-enabled platform powered by AI/ML & routinely collected electronic health record data for early detection + care in Alzheimer's disease
Full Description: DigiCARE Realized is an emerging AI-technology firm commercializing evidence-based solutions to modernize care for complex brain disease through decision intelligence in early detection and care management. Our initial focus is in Alzheimer’s disease and related dementia (ADRD) where we seek to realize equitable, accessible, and patient-centered care. We collaborate with health systems to deliver routine brain care for our growing, aging population. DigiCARE Realized offers an AI-enabled platform for delivering decision intelligence to support proactive care in ADRD. Machine learning advancements, like decision intelligence, automate processing of vast data sources to deliver faster, actionable insights for providers.  Our flagship product is based on a core principle that if you can measure it, you can manage it. Early detection offers the opportunity for timely diagnosis leading to more proactive care.  We aim to develop and curate care management solutions.  Powered by machine learning, our software provides passive ADRD detection with ~80% performance accuracy for 1- and 3-year prediction horizons.  It combs through routinely-collected data found in patient health records to sort through structured and unstructured data.  Our flagship product can help detect early-stage ADRD in all patients, regardless of what language they speak, how little time their provider has, or what kind of screening approach is selected that day. When health systems can detect early-stage ADRD in patients, they can give them better care.  Providers can offer interventions sooner, they can prevent hospital readmissions, and they can accelerate participation in clinical trials.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Health Care

Description: Friendly Diamonds is a fast growing online retailer of certified laboratory grown diamonds, diamond engagement rings and fine jewelry.
Full Description: Friendly Diamonds is a fast growing online retailer of certified laboratory grown diamonds, diamond engagement rings and fine jewelry. With our commitment to sustainability and customer-centricity, we hope to inspire a more transparent and eco-friendly jewelry industry.  We are Customer Obsessed :   Our online platform provides a wholesome jewelry buying experience for our customers, allowing them to customize each part of their jewelry on our user friendly interface. Our team of jewelry experts prioritize educating the customer over and above making the final sale. Our shipping, returns, warranty and other policies are created keeping the customers convenience in mind. We sell directly to the customer, cutting out middlemen costs and passing on the savings to the customer. Our aim is to make our brand a more Customer-Friendly place to fulfil all their diamond and jewelry buying requirements.  Following a Sustainable Approach :   In an industry that follows irresponsible mining practices, Friendly Diamonds’ vision is to minimize its impact on the environment. Staying true to our brand name, we take great pride in producing jewelry made from laboratory grown diamonds that are akin to natural diamonds in terms of sparkle and brilliance. Our diamonds are manufactured in laboratories that run on renewable energy that maintain highest safety standards for those running it. We intend to revolutionize the jewelry industry by marrying state-of-the-art technology with brilliant designs at affordable price points without compromising the quality and conscience.  The Friendly Diamond Culture : We incorporate a culture full of passion. We as a team are a bunch of innovative, enthusiastic, and highly creative individuals who create a difference in individual customer experience as well as the business. Join us to be a part of our great vision, and immerse yourself in the Friendly experience.
